Stratify OS » Device Interface » Analog to Digital Converter (ADC)

ADC Pin assignment.

#include <adc.h>

Data Fields

mcu_pin_t channel [4]
 

Field Documentation

mcu_pin_t adc_pin_assignment_t::channel[4]

Pins to use with the ADC. If more than 4 are needed, make multiple calls to I_ADC_SETATTR
